name: Gyana Na Kashu
flavorText: The stone envelopes one's enemies in the warm embrace of a raging fire. The screaming drowns out their sincere thanks.
flavorTextHtml: The stone envelopes one's enemies in the warm embrace of a raging fire. The screaming drowns out their sincere thanks.

primary.textHtml: Increases Lashing Tail Kick Damage by [75 - 100]%
primary.text: Increases Lashing Tail Kick Damage by [75 - 100]%

secondary.textHtml: Lashing Tail Kick releases a piercing fireball that deals 1138% weapon damage as Fire to enemies within 10 yards on impact. (Monk Only) [1050 - 1400]%
